document.masterDocTitle: On the taxonomy of the Prabhasa / Zadadra generic complex with descriptions of two new genera and two new species (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae, Lithosiini)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lithosia distorta Moore, 1872
,
Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
1872 : 572 ( Type locality: [NE India ] “ Sikkim ”).

=
Zadadra neodistorta Joshi, Kirti & N. Singh, 2015
, Florida Entomologist 98 (2): 537, figs 1–5 ( Type locality: “ India , Nagaland , Tuenseng ,
1600 m
”), syn. nov.

Type material examined.

of

(hereby designated) ( Figs 11 , 27 ): ♂ , “Ind” / “Type.” / “
Lithosia distorta Moore
(type) ♂ ” / “ TYPE LEP.: No. 401

, ½. HOPE DEPT . OXFORD” / “A” / “549”, gen. slide No.: 2019-1732 (prepared by Volynkin) ( OUMNH );

of

: 1 ♂ , “Cherra Punji ♂ ” / “

1377437” ( NHMUK ); 1 ♀ ( Fig. 12 ), “Cherra Punji ♀ ” / “

” / “Moore Coll. 94-106” / blue ring “
Syntype ” label / QR-code label with unique number “ BMNH (E) 1377435” / “ Arctiidae genitalia slide No. 4556” ( NHMUK ); 1 ♂ , “Cherra Punji ♂ ” / “Moore Coll. 94-106” / QRcode label with unique number “ NHMUK010606001
”,
gen. slide No.: NHMUK010313474 (prepared by Volynkin)
( NHMUK ).
Holotype
of
Zadadra neodistorta
: ♂ , India , Sikkim , Rongli ,
1400m
,
05.V.2009
, registration number: PUP/RJ-143a, gen. slide No.: PUP/R-143a (prepared by Joshi) (PUP/ RJ );
paratypes
of
Zadadra neodistorta
: 2 ♂ with the same data as in the holotype , registration numbers: PUP/RJ-143b and PUP/RJ-143c) (PUP/ RJ )
.

Remark . In order to stabilize the nomenclature, we hereby designate the dissected male syntype housed in the OUMNH collection as lectotype .

Distribution . Nepal ( Kishida 1993 , 1994 , as
Eilema distorta
, part) and Northeastern India ( Sikkim and Meghalaya ) ( Moore 1872 ;
Joshi et al. 2015
, as
Z. neodistorta
), Thailand , Vietnam ( Černý & Pinratana 2009 ).
